1: <pb/><e>Bit yet chi ajtok eb israel bay Jerusalén.</e> <pb/><t>Watx' et, mac ach ay yelapnok Jehová yul a sat, cax ikem ach bay.</t>
2: <t>Yin tzalojc'ulal ok a lo' sat awoj, cax watx' ok ach elocok.</t>
3: <t>Axca wal satni an uva yinlak atut tol xiwil sat an, caytu' yayji etbi. Axca wal wol te olivo, caytu' ok yun eb oninal yinlak a meẍa.</t>
4: <t>Caywal tu' ok yun yak'on Jehová watx'c'ulalil bay mac ay yelapnok Cham yul sat.</t>
5: <pb/><t>Yak'okab Jehová watx'c'ulalil ebantac'al bay tzalan Sión yet iquis ach. Yilokab a sat is watx'c'ulalil yin Jerusalén junjun c'u.</t>
6: <t>Yilokab a sat e a txiquin. <pb/>¡Ayokab junc'ulal jiban ayon Israel on ti'!</t>
